changeSet.createView: select pid, sid, tname, weekend_start_hour as we_st, weekend_end_hour as we_ed, weekday_start_hour as wd_st, weekday_end_hour as wd_ed, area, position from ( select s.weekday_id as wd_id, s.weekend_id as we_id, s.id as sid, s.position_id as pid, s.task_name as tname, area, p.title as position from "sequ_shift" s inner join sequ_position p on p.id=s.position_id and s.end_date is null ) schedule left outer join ( select h.id as wehid, h.start_hour as weekend_start_hour, h.end_hour as weekend_end_hour from sequ_hours h ) weekendHours on wehid = wd_id left outer join ( select h.id as wdhid, h.start_hour as weekday_start_hour, h.end_hour as weekday_end_hour from sequ_hours h ) weekdayHours on wdhid = we_id

select id, history from sequ_user u full outer join ( select user_id as eid, STRING_AGG( concat_ws(':',to_char(date_employed, 'mm-dd-yyyy')::text, to_char(date_unemployed, 'mm-dd-yyyy')::text), ',' order by user_id, date_employed) AS history from sequ_employment_history h group by user_id ) pos on u.id = pos.eid

select * from ( select sid, eid, fname, day/*, to_char(to_date(day,'dd/mm/yyyy'), 'DAY') as weekday*/ from ( select * from sequ_sch_template_view ) schtmp natural join ( select i.user_id as eid, i.shift_id as sid, i.on_date as day from sequ_is_scheduled_for i ) scheduled natural join ( select e.id as eid, e.first_name as fname from sequ_user e ) emp ) sch_hist_view order by day

select id, pid from sequ_user e full outer join ( select user_id as eid, STRING_AGG(position_id || '', ',' ORDER BY user_id) AS pid from sequ_has_position p where p.date_removed is null group by user_id ) pos on e.id = pos.eid

select id, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun from sequ_user e full outer join ( select user_id as eid, STRING_AGG(concat_ws(':', startt::text, endt::text), ',' ORDER BY user_id) AS mon from sequ_availability where day = 'mon' group by user_id ) m on e.id = m.eid full outer join ( select user_id as eid, STRING_AGG(concat_ws(':', startt::text, endt::text), ',' ORDER BY user_id) AS tue from sequ_availability where day = 'tue' group by user_id ) t on e.id = t.eid full outer join ( select user_id as eid, STRING_AGG(concat_ws(':', startt::text, endt::text), ',' ORDER BY user_id) AS wed from sequ_availability where day = 'wed' group by user_id ) w on e.id = w.eid full outer join ( select user_id as eid, STRING_AGG(concat_ws(':', startt::text, endt::text), ',' ORDER BY user_id) AS thu from sequ_availability where day = 'thu' group by user_id ) th on e.id = th.eid full outer join ( select user_id as eid, STRING_AGG(concat_ws(':', startt::text, endt::text), ',' ORDER BY user_id) AS fri from sequ_availability where day = 'fri' group by user_id ) f on e.id = f.eid full outer join ( select user_id as eid, STRING_AGG(concat_ws(':', startt::text, endt::text), ',' ORDER BY user_id) AS sat from sequ_availability where day = 'sat' group by user_id ) sa on e.id = sa.eid full outer join ( select user_id as eid, STRING_AGG(concat_ws(':', startt::text, endt::text), ',' ORDER BY user_id) AS sun from sequ_availability where day = 'sun' group by user_id ) su on e.id = su.eid

select e.id, first_name, last_name, email, is_manager, birth_date, max_hrs_week, phone_number, clock_number, pid as positions, history, min_hrs_week, classification_id, concat_ws(' ', concat('mon,', mon::text), concat('tue,', tue::text), concat('wed,', wed::text), concat('thu,', thu::text), concat('fri,', fri::text), concat('sat,', sat::text), concat('sun,', sun::text)) as avail from sequ_user e inner join sequ_user_history_view h on e.id = h.id inner join sequ_user_position_view p on e.id = p.id inner join sequ_user_avail_view a on e.id = a.id

select vac.id as rid, vac.responded_by, vac.requested_by, vac.is_approved, vac.start_date_time, vac.end_date_time, requester.first_name as requester_first_name, requester.last_name as requester_last_name, responder.first_name as responder_first_name, responder.last_name as responder_last_name from sequ_requests_vacation vac left join ( select * from sequ_user )requester on vac.requested_by = requester.id left join ( select * from sequ_user )responder on vac.responded_by = responder.id

select m_sid as sid, tname, we_st, we_ed, wd_st, wd_ed, area, position, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun, mon_eid, tue_eid, wed_eid, thu_eid, fri_eid, sat_eid, sun_eid from ( -- Monday /* monday gathers the shift information for the week, while subsequent days * only gather the names for the employees scheduled based on the shift */ select s.sid as m_sid, s.tname, s.we_st, s.we_ed, s.wd_st, s.wd_ed, s.area, s.position, h.fname as mon, h.eid as mon_eid from sequ_sch_template_view s left outer join sequ_sch_hist_view h on s.sid=h.sid --and h.day = to_date('23-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy') ) mm full outer join ( -- Tuesday select s.sid as t_sid, h.fname as tue, h.eid as tue_eid from sequ_sch_template_view s left outer join sequ_sch_hist_view h on s.sid=h.sid --and h.day = to_date('24-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy') ) tt on m_sid = t_sid full outer join ( -- Wednesday select s.sid as w_sid, h.fname as wed, h.eid as wed_eid from sequ_sch_template_view s left outer join sequ_sch_hist_view h on s.sid=h.sid --and h.day = to_date('25-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy') ) ww on m_sid = w_sid full outer join ( -- Thursday select s.sid as th_sid, h.fname as thu, h.eid as thu_eid from sequ_sch_template_view s left outer join sequ_sch_hist_view h on s.sid=h.sid --and h.day = to_date('26-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy') ) th on m_sid = th_sid full outer join ( -- Friday select s.sid as f_sid, h.fname as fri, h.eid as fri_eid from sequ_sch_template_view s left outer join sequ_sch_hist_view h on s.sid=h.sid --and h.day = to_date('27-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy') ) ff on m_sid = f_sid full outer join ( -- Saturday select s.sid as sa_sid, h.fname as sat, h.eid as sat_eid from sequ_sch_template_view s left outer join sequ_sch_hist_view h on s.sid=h.sid --and h.day = to_date('28-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy') ) sa on m_sid = sa_sid full outer join ( -- Sunday select s.sid as su_sid, h.fname as sun, h.eid as sun_eid from sequ_sch_template_view s left outer join sequ_sch_hist_view h on s.sid=h.sid --and h.day = to_date('29-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy') ) su on m_sid = su_sid --order by wd_st, area, we_st
